about_the_game:
Alien Shooter - Vengeance is the large-scale sequel to the first part of Alien Shooter. In this unique fusion of arcade action and RPG elements, the carnage continues with non-stop fury!

Battle hordes of aliens that are pouring through the teleports and threatening to escape the top secret M.A.G.M.A. base. With more than 50 types of weapons at your disposal, you will be fighting up 100 monsters simultaneously on screen. Wipe out the enemy with 3 different game modes: Campaign, Survival, and Multiplayer. You are the last hope in keeping this threat from invading the earth!

  • Dynamic shadows and lighting
  • About 10 000 monsters on each map, with up to 100 monsters simultaneously onscreen
  • Natural phenomena (fog, rain, water)
  • NPC characters
  • More than 50 types of weapons
  • More than 20 types of useful gadgets
  • Three game modes: Campaign, Survival and Multiplayer
  • Dynamic music soundtrack and effects

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 2000/XP/Vista™
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM or greater
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce2 or ATI Radeon 8500 or better
  • Hard Drive: 2.5 GB hard drive space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible
  • Input: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse

Recommended:

  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 2000/XP
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM or greater
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce FX 5700 or better, ATI Radeon 9600 or better; 128MB video memory
  • Hard Drive: 2.5 GB hard drive space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible
  • Input: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
